title: Events: Managing Fields
body:
Events: Managing Fields¶

Fields displays the contact fields and ticket fields requested by a program for an event.
You can not delete or edit a contact’s first name, last name, or email, nor can you disable the name on the ticket.
To view this feature, you must have navigated to an event. Refer to Events if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Click Fields

  2. Click and Edit Field to edit a contact field

  3. Click and Delete Field to delete a contact field

  4. Click Add Field to add a contact field

    • Add an existing contact field or create and add a custom field

  5. Click Ticket

  6. Click to disable a ticket field

  7. Click Add Field to add a ticket field

    • Click Select an option

    • Click one of the options and create your custom ticket field

  8. Click and Edit Field to edit an added ticket field

  9. Click and Delete Field to delete an added ticket field
